title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-1.9 - Use of United States Department of Agriculture grading terms for pork
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 272-1.9 - Use of United States Department of Agriculture grading terms for pork

State Regulations

United States Department of Agriculture grading terms, for example, "prime," "choice," etc., shall not be used in labeling or
advertising pork. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
272-1.9

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
